extDescription.message: Reduces Claude.ai memory usage by limiting chat history. Prevents browser slowdowns during long conversations.

aboutText.message: Reduces Claude.ai memory usage by limiting chat history. Prevents browser slowdowns during long conversations.

tipKeepMessages.message: Number of recent messages to keep visible. Older messages will be removed to save memory.

tipAutoClean.message: Automatically remove old messages when the page loads and when new messages arrive.

tipRam.message: Current JavaScript memory usage. High values may slow down your browser.

tipCleanNow.message: Manually remove old messages right now.

tipPause.message: Temporarily disable cleaning on this tab to view the full conversation history.
